name: Sibling Feud
description:
Try and win the challanges against your sister in order to get the new bedroom to yourself.

This game was made for the Indie Tales Jam, I hope you like it :D

1st game: Tug war

Goal: Pull the other person over the cone to win

Controlls- Left mouse button

2nd game: Basketball

Goal: Score 10 goals in 30 seconds

Controlls- Left mouse button

3nd:  Hot potato

Goal: Don't have the potato in your hand when the time is up (approx. 30sec)

Controlls- Left mouse button
